description: Main source file for a Flutter-based mobile/web application named 'Blue Collar Connect'. It sets up the app structure, routing, themes, and core UI screens including user onboarding, authentication, tabs for dashboard, jobs, applications, messages, profile, and settings. The file defines the app's main entry point, widget hierarchy, navigation logic, and stub implementations for various screens and interactions, integrating several providers for state management and backend data handling.

classes.name: BlueCollarConnectRoot
classes.description: Root widget initializing global providers for app-wide data and services.

classes.name: BlueCollarConnectApp
classes.description: The main application widget setting themes, responsiveness, and initial screen.

classes.name: AppRoot
classes.description: Determines whether to show onboarding/auth or main app screens based on user authentication state.

classes.name: OnboardingScreen
classes.description: Welcoming screen for new users and sign-in/register initiation.

classes.name: AuthScreen
classes.description: Stub for sign-in/register flow, currently a demo placeholder.

classes.name: TabbedMainShell
classes.description: Shell widget managing bottom navigation and switching between main app sections.

classes.name: JobsScreen
classes.description: Displays list of jobs with provider integration.

classes.name: JobDetailsScreen
classes.description: Detailed view of a specific job, with apply functionality.

classes.name: ProfileScreen
classes.description: User profile and basic edit options.

classes.name: CompanyDetailsScreen
classes.description: Details for a company, shown upon tapping a job or company tile.

classes.name: ChatBubble
classes.description: Visual widget for chat messages, indicating sender.

methods.name: main
methods.description: App entry point; sets URL strategy for web and launches the root widget.
